meaningMnemonic: The <radical>leader</radical> of the <radical>shellfish</radical> has a <radical>knife</radical> in its <kanji>side</kanji>. It's fine though, don't worry, it's just a reminder that he won the great shellfish war back when they were trying to choose the new leader.
readingMnemonic: Because of this knife in his <kanji>side</kanji>, he can't pronounce certain words correctly. The most obvious one is when he says <reading>川</reading> (かわ), but it comes out of the side of his mouth as がわ.
